column1: Table 2.10: Whether sought help or advice for a mental health concern1,2 by mental health of child or young person, age and sex, 2021
Source: Mental Health of Children and Young People in England, 2021: Wave 2 follow up to the 2017 survey, NHS Digital
1. Based on parent report for 6 to 16 year olds and self-report for 17 to 23 year olds.

2. This question was asked if parents said they had any concerns or worries about their child’s, or young people said they had any concerns or worries about their own, mental health, or emotional, behavioural or concentration problems since 1st August 2020.
3. Some figures have been suppressed due to low reliability resulting from small base sizes. These are denoted by a 'u'.
